700711f-a.folder: Castle Hill Avenue & Norton Avenue, Bronx, NY

700712f-a.text:
Castle Hill Avenue, east side, north of Norton A.venue, showing part of the house and the estate of John Screven stretching out toward Westchester Creek and the East River. Screven inherited the property from his father-in-law Gouverneur
Morris Wilkins.
Between 1900 and 1913
700712f-a.folder: Castle Hill Avenue & Norton Avenue, Bronx, NY

700713f-a.text:
Castle Hill Ave., east side, north of Norton Ave., showing the John Screven (also spelled Screvin) Mansion. It originally belonged to Gouverneur Morris Wilkins and later to his son-in-law 4dut Screven, after whom the area is familiarly known as Screven's Point.
Between 1909 and 1913.
V
